summary: A transformation that overlays text onto images using configurable fonts, sizes, colors, and optional text augmentations, selecting random bounding boxes and adjusting font size relative to box height, with optional background clearing, driven by metadata and applied probabilistically.
business_intent: Generate synthetic text variations within images to enrich training data for OCR, document analysis, and visual text detection models, enhancing robustness to diverse fonts, colors, and textual alterations.
